choices.columns: Columns (title on left. Text/button on the right)

sub_fields.label: Color
sub_fields.name: color
sub_fields.instructions: The color selected here is applied to the top and bottom border. As well as the number.

sub_fields.label: Icons

sub_fields.instructions: Please visit the icons post type to add, edit and remove icons. This includes the text outputted just below the icon.
